00001 /*  
00002  * File: mthFlowEqnDiffImp.h 
00003  * ----------------------- 
00004  * Header file of implementation connection list 
00005  * for mthFlowEqnModel class
00006  *
00007  * This class and its inheritance classes implement the DIFF term in flow eqns.
00008  *
00009  * All data in this class and its inheritance classes should be copied 
00010  * from mthFlowEqnModel class and its inheritance classes except 
00011  * connection-specific data:
00012  *        copy values for value-type data
00013  *    copy address for pointer type data (shared)
00014  * 
00015  * ------------------------------------------  
00016  * Created by YFan in Fan. 2006
00017  *        
00018  */ 
00019 
00020 #ifndef MTHFLOWEQNDIFFIMP_H_ 
00021 #define MTHFLOWEQNDIFFIMP_H_ 
00022         
00023 #include "../utl/DataPool.h" 
00024 
00025 class mthFlowEqnModel;
00026  
00027 class mthFlowEqnDiffImp  { 
00028 public: 
00029         mthFlowEqnDiffImp(mthFlowEqnModel *flowEqn); 
00030         virtual ~mthFlowEqnDiffImp();
00031   
00032         virtual void registerData(); // register data from datapool
00033         virtual void createData()=0;    // create data
00034 
00035         virtual void calcConnDifAndUpStrDir()=0;
00036         virtual void linearizeDiff()=0;
00037         virtual void linearizeDisp()=0;
00038   
00039 protected:
00040 
00041         // --- read only variables, copied from  mthFlowEqnModel class---
00042         DataPool* mDataPool;  // pointer to datapool
00043   
00044         int nCells, nConns, nPhases, nComps, nHCPhases, nHCComps;
00045 
00046         int nPri, nSec; // number of primary and secondary variables
00047 
00048         const double *mPhase_Comp;      // phase and component relation (desolved?)
00049 
00050         const double *mDepth, *mVol;    // cell depth and volume
00051         const double *mPoro, *mDPoro_Dp; // cell porosity and its derivatives
00052         const double *mPc, *mDPc_Ds;    // phase capillary pressure and its derivatives
00053         const double *mDens, *mDDens_Dp;        // phase density and its derivatives
00054         const double *mMob, *mDMob_Dp, *mDMob_Ds; // phase mobility and its derivatives
00055         const double *mCompMass; // component mass (Black-Oil) | mole (Compositional)
00056 
00057         const int *nImpVars;    // number of implicit variables at each block
00058         const int *transImp;    // implicitness of transmissibility at each block
00059 
00060         // --- updated variables ---
00061         double *mPres, *mSat, *mXcp;    // pressure (first phase), saturation, mole fractions
00062         double *mPotDif;                                // phase potential diference for each connection
00063         int *mUpstreamDir;      // phase flow upstream direction for each connecton
00064         double *mDisper;        // dispersivity
00065 
00066         double *mOldP, *mOldS, *mOldXcp;  // pres, sat, and mole frac at ole timestep 
00067         double *mOldAcc, *mOldMob;      // accumulation term and mobility at old timestep
00068 
00069         double *mDiag, *mOffD_A, *mOffD_B;      // Jacobian (diagonal and two off-diagonals) 
00070         double *mRHS;   // right hand side
00071 
00072         mthFlowEqnModel* mFlowEqn;
00073         
00074 private:
00075         void copyInitialData();  //copy data from mthModelBase class 
00076 };
